dl.dd: Get or set the end of the selected portion of the field's text. Use in conjuction with the template.XULProp("selectionStart") property. The value specifies the index of the character after the selection. If this value is equal to the value of the template.XULProp("selectionStart") property, no text is selected, but the value indicates the position of the caret (cursor) within the textbox.
